argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fsumge0.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | fsumge0.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | fsumge0.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> 0 <_ B ) |
| 4 |  | fsumge1.4 | |- ( k = M -> B = C ) |
| 5 |  | fsumge1.5 | |- ( ph -> M e. A ) |
| 6 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. k e. A B e. CC ) |
| 8 | 4 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( k = M -> ( B e. CC <-> C e. CC ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rspcv | |- ( M e. A -> ( A. k e. A B e. CC -> C e. CC ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 7, 9 | #P_sylc | |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) |
| 11 | 4 | #P_sumsn | |- ( ( M e. A /\ C e. CC ) -> sum_ k e. { M } B = C ) |
| 12 | 5, 10, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. { M } B = C ) |
| 13 | 5 | #P_snssd | |- ( ph -> { M } C_ A ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 3, 13 | #P_fsumless | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. { M } B <_ sum_ k e. A B ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_eqbrtrrd | |- ( ph -> C <_ sum_ k e. A B ) |
